input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Valid Values: BMC_AR_System, HP_ServiceCenter

String Value - Class name
BMC_Atrium and BMC_AR_System
Valid Values:
BMC_ComputerSystem BMC_LANEndpoint BMC_Person
HP_ServiceCenter
Valid Values:
HPSC_ComputerSystem HPSC_NetworkDevice HPSC_Contact

output.description: An XML document containing detail for one or more configuration item.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

output.value: This is the configuration information for the new test.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Configuration-Item) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Configuration-Item" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration item}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Configuration-Items> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Configuration-Item) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Configuration-Item" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${configuration item}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Configuration-Items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: This is the configuration information for Test CMDB Person99

documentation.description: This work flow tests the creation of a configuration item.
